title: Inside the Vets
overview: Inside the Vets uses fixed-rig cameras to provide a unique perspective of the incredible work undertaken by veterinary surgeon Clive Munn and his team of specialists, who go to extreme lengths to care for the pets that matter most.From treating furry felines and the UK's most exotic species, to the love and hope shown by doting owners and the camaraderie between staff, Inside The Vets promises to be heart-warming television.
